effect.Name: Signed Difference
effect.description: Signed Difference - The blend color is subtracted from the base color, then this is divided by 2, and 0.5 is added at the very end
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Signed Difference (Background) Shader | 1.0 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: The blend color is subtracted from the base color, then this is divided by 2, and 0.5 is added at the very end

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of blend visibility
